snippet.title: Machina of the Planet Tree -Planet Ruler- PV
snippet.description:
An indie JRPG by Denneko Yuugi, Planet Ruler combines lush scenery and gorgeous with a fast paced, combo oriented action point battle system! Follow the adventures of Cram, Retla, and Esty as they find the secrets of the Great Ruins, and the truth behind the wars from long ago!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/383960/
